message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe will be a valuable asset to you.  My initial asking price is $1,700,000.  I'm confident we can find a price that works for both of us.
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1,400,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but I'm still committed to getting a fair price for this unique product.  I'm willing to come down to $1,600,000.  This price reflects the value of the product and allows for some room for negotiation.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,500,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.
